humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is invasive pleomorphic lobular carcinoma with a greatest dimension of 2.2 cm. Based on the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size, and T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the tumor in this report is a T2 tumor.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size is given as 2.2 cm, which falls in the T2 category. The T2 category includes tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
